question: What is the most unusual basketball court in the world and why is it unique?

steps.content: What is the most unusual basketball court in the world and why is it unique?
Plan: 1) Search for information about unusual basketball courts around the world. 2) Identify the most unique one and explain why it is unique. 3) Return the answer.
Searching for the most unusual basketball court in the world and its unique features.

The most unusual basketball court in the world is the 'Floating Basketball Court' in the Maldives. It is unique because it is built on a floating platform in the middle of the ocean, offering players a stunning 360-degree view of the surrounding sea.
